title: The foot-post of Douer With his packet stuft full of strange and merry petitions.
author: Nixon, Anthony.
publisher: Printed by Edw: Allde, and are to be solde by Iohn Deane, dwelli[n]g iust vnder Temple barre,
notes: Imprint slightly mutilated in only known copy.
A variant (or reissue with cancel quire [A]?) of: A straunge foot-post, 1613.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
